title: PH/ORP Controller
type: Bộ đo đơn chỉ tiêu PH controller (PHUONG HAI SJC)
desc:
- Design system, hardware and firmware using MCU STM32F1 as central processor.
- Communication with GLCD via SPI use u8g2 library
- Read sensor (PH, EC, TDS, COD, ...) via Modbus RTU master use FreeModbus library.
- Read Temperature PT1000.
- Return data via Modbus RTU slave use FreeModbus, and output 4-20mA.
- Set relay trigger thresholds for pump control connection. 
- Config Menu allows user to setup and save parameters

title: Datalogger
type: Datalogger SmartPH (PHUONG HAI SJC)
desc:
- Use MCU STM ARM Cortex and Raspberry Compute Module 3/4
- Circuit design using KICAD software.
- Using C and Python for programing.
- Read input: analog (current 4-20mA/0-10V) input, pulse input, input digital, RS485/RS232
- Design user interfaces on 7inch Capacitor Touch LCD TFT 800x480
- HTTP post data to Restful API over ethernet TCP/IP or Module SIM4G.
- Control I/O over MQTT/Websocket
- Connect FTP transfer document to FPT Server
- Connect BLE read value BLE Device

title: Water sample cabinet
type: Board điều khiển tủ lấy mẫu (PHUONG HAI SJC)
desc:
- Design system, hardware and firmware using STM32F1 as central processor
- Communication with GLCD via SPI use u8g2 library
- Communication with driver Step TB6600 via Timer Pulse and I/O control, control the rotating mechanism to pour water into the bottle.
- Read sensor detect water and flow sensor via I/O and Count Pulse
- Read temperature RTD PT100 with IC MAX31865 via SPI and control refrigeration compressor
- Modbus slave communcation use FreeModbus library
- Write program that implements the main feature and screen interface, has a setup menu

title: WebApp Monitor Station
type: WebApp Monitor Station (PHUONG HAI SJC)
desc:
- Design system use NodeJs write backend insert data from datalogger (via Serial Modbus) to database (MongoDB) setup on computer
- insert data in time series set interval 
- Using Reactjs write webApp View the most recent data, View data history and export report csv/pdf
- Using PM2 deploy Nodejs App run auto 24/7 get data
- Using Apache deploy Webapp
- Using Electronjs build package software run Desktop view data
- NATPORT IP static monitor over internet

title: Pump Metering
type: Bơm định lượng (PHUONG HAI SJC)
desc:
- Design system, hardware and firmware using STM32F1 as central processor
- Circuit design and layout using KICAD software.
- Communication scan display LED7SEG
- Communication rotary encoder button setup speed pump
- Communication driver DRV8825 control step PUMP
- Communication Slave Modbus use FreeModbus library config and control Pump
- Input Digital select direction of rotation
- Run CNC Machine make a protective case

title: FUMEHOOD LCD TFT CAPACITOR TOUCH
type: Board điều khiển tủ hút GreenLab(PHUONG HAI SJC)
desc:
- Design system, hardware and firmware using STM32F4 as central processor
- Communication with LCD TFT via FSMC connect to SSD1963, port to LVGL library
- Modbus slave communcation use FreeModbus library
- Read temperature, humidity, light, diffrential pressure sensor modules via modbus RTU and use PID algorithm to control motor speed to achieve the require airflow speed.
- Control Light, FAN, Door
- Connect ESP32 via modbusRTU push data to server

title: FUMEHOOD LCD TFT TOUCH PAD
type: Board điều khiển tủ hút (PHUONG HAI SJC)
desc:
- Design system, hardware and firmware using STM32F1 as central processor
- Communication wiht LCD TFT via SPI (ILI9341) and use library LVGL make GUI
- Control LAMP/FAN

title: FUMEHOOD Pressure Sensor
type: Board cảm biến chênh áp (PHUONG HAI SJC)
desc: - Design board use Holtek HT32f52253 read sensor SDP810 Sensirion and calculator return result to Modbus RTU

title: PT100 to Modbus
type: Module chuyển đổi cảm biến nhiệt độ PT100 to Modbus RTU (PHUONG HAI SJC)
desc: - Design board use STM32F030 read temperature PT100 via MAX31865 and calculator return data result to ModbusRTU

title: Biological Safety Cabinet class2
type: Board điều khiển tủ An toàn sinh học cấp 2 (PHUONG HAI SJC)
desc:
- Design system, hardware and firmware using STM32F1 as central processor
- Communication with GLCD via SPI use u8g2 library
- Modbus slave communcation use FreeModbus library.
- Read sensor pressure via I2C displays metrics and gives filter change warnings.
- Control ON/OFF toggle, on/off timer device LAMP, UV, FAN, SOCKET
- Control door pull motor opens and closes the door.
- Design keyboard decal interface

title: PCR Cabinet

desc:

- Communication with GLCD via SPI use u8g2 library
- Modbus slave communcation use FreeModbus library.
- Read sensor pressure via I2C displays metrics and gives filter change warnings.

title: Temperature logger

- Communication with sever via WIFI

- Read PT100
- Read battery level
- Display OLED LCD using U8G2 library

title: Air node (Temp, Humi, TVOC, CO2, PM2.5, PM10) ModbusRTU
type: Bộ đo chất lượng không khí trong phòng thí nghiệm Modbus RTU (PHUONG HAI SJC)
desc:
- Design system, hardware and firmware using STM32F1 as central processor
- Read temperature, humidity, tvoc, co2, pm2.5, pm10
- calculator and convert result meansure to ModbusRTU 
- Calibration two point for each indicator

title: IAQ Node BLE
type: Bộ đo chất lượng không khí trong phòng thí nghiệm giao tiếp Bluetooth BLE (PHUONG HAI SJC)
desc:

- Control brighness LED LIGHT

 Design user interfaces on 7inch Capacitor Touch LCD TFT 800x480

title: Greenbot
type: Board điều khiển thủy canh thông minh (GREENBOT)
desc:
- Board điều khiển thủy canh thông minh
- Giao tiếp STM32F103RBT6 với ESP8266 qua UART
- STM32 đọc cảm biến gửi data đến ESP8266 và nhận lệnh điều khiển từ ESP8266 qua UART
- ESP8266 sử dụng giao thức smartconfig để kết nối wifi, sau khi kết nối được internet thì ESP8266 sử dụng giao thức MQTT để public và subscribe MQTT broker trên cloud Greenbot
